name: Trustopia
description:
The story takes place in the year 2039.

The city of Trustopia has isolated itself from the world and is ruled by the government with an aggressive hand.
To counter a possible coup, the government has secret spies throughout the population.
You have chosen to escape this city.
Be careful not to be sold to the authorities, because the government has eyes and ears everywhere.
Trust no one!
